articles.title: Heartthrob ‘American Idol’ Contestant Fritz Hager Impresses With James Bay Cover: Watch - Billboard
articles.description: The 22-year-old singer made new fans (and set hearts aflutter) with a performance of James Bay's “Let It Go”.
articles.content:
From guarding property to stealing hearts, Fritz Hager has been something of a surprise package on American Idol.

articles.title: Airline fires back at star’s Twitter complaint - news.com.au
articles.description: An American flight company has hit back at Australian rapper Iggy Azalea, who had earlier taken to Twitter to complain about her recent experience with the airline.
